src.sql: IF EXISTS ( SELECT TOP 1 PSU.[State] FROM dbo.PlantAnApp_Updates_SpecificUpdates AS PSU INNER JOIN dbo.PlantAnApp_Updates_Hotfixes AS PH ON PH.ProductID = PSU.Product WHERE PSU.[State] = 'Critical' AND PSU.Product = '[TknParams:ProductID]' AND PSU.Version > PH.InstalledVersion ) BEGIN SELECT 'Critical' END ELSE IF EXISTS ( SELECT TOP 1 PSU.[State] FROM dbo.PlantAnApp_Updates_SpecificUpdates AS PSU INNER JOIN dbo.PlantAnApp_Updates_Hotfixes AS PH ON PH.ProductID = PSU.Product WHERE PSU.[State] = 'Recommended' AND PSU.Product = '[TknParams:ProductID]' AND PSU.Version > PH.InstalledVersion ) BEGIN SELECT 'Recommended' END ELSE BEGIN SELECT [State] FROM dbo.PlantAnApp_Updates_Hotfixes WHERE Id = '[TknParams:HotfixID]' END
